Professional

I'm Head of Digital for The King's Fund.

I previously worked at The Royal Marsden and The Royal Marsden Cancer Charity.

You can find me on LinkedIn.

Creative

Read what I have to say about stuff in general on my blog and about food and drink in Crystal Palace on Crystal Palace Grub Crawl.

I’ve played drums in bands like Dora Brilliant, Cop on the Edge and HOST.

Social

Follow me on Twitter (I’m @jiggott).

I like taking photos and occasionally post stuff on Flickr and Instagram.

I briefly held the Swivelympics world record for swivelling on an office chair.
